column2: Transfer a state or colonial region to another country with no effect on infamy, prestige, or jingoism
Non-Accepted Bureaucrats Fix Cooldown is 5 years.
This event converts all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen on your cores into artisans.

This decision is intended to salvage your country after it has been craftsmen hijacked. It will revert all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen on your cores to artisans so that your core craftsmen will start working. (Think South Germans in Venetia hijacking.) BE CAREFUL OF USE
This decision is intended to convert non-accepted Bureaucrats into Artisans, in both states and colonies, so they stop getting fat off of state admin funding.
